method.value:
1. Pour the 6 cups of water in a large saucepan, add salt and boil over medium high heat.
  2. Add squid and cook for 3 minutes until tender. Remove squid with a slotted spoon and drain in ice water. Cut squid into small pieces and place in a large bowl.
  3. Add shrimp to boiling water and cook for 3 minutes until tender. Remove squid with a slotted spoon and drain in ice water. Place squid in the large bowl with squid.
  4. Add octopus to simmering water and simmer for 2 hours until tender. Remove octopus with a slotted spoon and drain in ice water. Cut octopus into small pieces and place in the large bowl.
  5. Add crab stick meat to the bowl of seafood mixture.
  6. Finely chop the fresh herbs.
  7. Add the herbs, olive oil, lemon juice and minced garlic into the seafood bowl. Toss to combine.
  8. Transfer to a plate and serve with lemon wedges as garnish.

description.value: A very quick and versatile pasta-free seafood salad. This is a basic recipe - feel free to add your own spin (grated carrots, diced green or red capsicums, red cabbage, seasonings).

ingredients.value:
6 cups water
1 tsp salt
300g squid, cleaned
300g shrimp, peeled and deveined
300g octopus, cleaned  
300g crab stick meat, chopped
1/4 cup fresh lemon juice
 3 cups mixed fresh herb leaves (mint, basil, parsley)
2 tbsp extra virgin olive oil
2 garlic cloves, minced
Lemon wedges
